description: Take lamb up a notch with sweet and sticky pomegranate glaze. This super easy lamb and grain salad recipe is a delicious way to serve this much-loved meat.
name: Pomegranate & MolassesGlazed Lamb With Ancient Grain Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 350g Woolworths BBQ Lamb Leg Steaks With Pomegranate & Molasses Glaze
1 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
1 lemon, juiced (save 1/2 lemon, cut into wedges, to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook barley in a saucepan of boiling water for 40 minutes or until tender. Drain. Rinse under cold water, then drain. When the barley has 15 minutes of cooking time left, cook lamb on an oiled barbecue grill according to packet instructions. Transfer to a plate, cover loosely with foil and rest for 5 minutes.
Toss barley with Qukes baby cucumber, radish, parsley oil and lemon juice. Serve lamb with salad and lemon wedges.
